import React, { useState } from 'react' function Form() { const [form, setForm] = useState({ name: '', cidade: '', age: 0 }); const [module, setModule] = useState(); const handleClick = (event) => { event.preventDefault() }; const handleChange = ({ target: { name, value } }) => { setForm({ ...form, [name]: value, }) }; return (
